amendment.description: Amendment allows communities to be reimbursed for certain costs associated with a successful challenge to a bona fide mapping error made by FEMA resulting in a Letter of Map Revision.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 112-138 to allow communities to be reimbursed for certain costs associated with a successful challenge to a bona fide mapping error made by FEMA resulting in a Letter of Map Revision.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
